short_summary: Washer Extractor for Correctional Services of Canada (CSC), Bowden Institution
description: A washer extractor for the Correctional Services of Canada (CSC) immediately needs to acquire a washer extractor for its control of laundry facility located in Innisfail, AB
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Tender Number**: WS3696003395
**Tender Title**: Washer Extractor
**Publication Date**: 21 December, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: 07 February, 2023 at 1400 MST

**Government Notice**: 
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires a washer extractor for its Bowden Institution laundry facility located in Innisfail, Alberta.

**Supply Requirements**: 
* UNSPSC Code: 47111500
* UNSPSC Description: Washing and drying equipment

**Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Tenders
**Selection Criteria**: Lowest price
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
**Notification Method**: Request for Proposal

**Contact Information**:
You can find detailed contact information and a notice URL at the [Ariba Discovery website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14951869?extsite=MTQ5NTE4NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Note**:
Please disregard any previous posting responses or closing times. All required documents and bids must be submitted by 1200 MST on February 7, 2023. Late bids will not be accepted.

The results of this tender are:
* Amended closing date and time
* UNSPSC description
* Approved contract language is subject to change

Ensure to check the latest updates before submitting your bid. Possibility of commercial conflict: no
